message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Could you consider that?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value to me is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $10,200?
